function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases spreading through contact with shared wearable RFID readers and tags","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases among operators and workers","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of wearable RFID readers and tags, and proper hygiene practices for operators and workers","Technologies":"UV disinfection devices, contactless RFID systems","People":"Operators, workers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility managers, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical interaction with assembly line equipment and devices","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementing contactless IoT technologies and reducing physical interaction with equipment, regular sanitization of equipment","Technologies":"Contactless IoT devices, UV disinfection systems","People":"Operators, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility managers, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Risk of disease transmission through shared touchpoints in the workplace environment","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases among individuals in the workplace","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of shared touchpoints, promoting hand hygiene practices among individuals","Technologies":"UV disinfection systems, touchless interfaces","People":"Employees, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, health and safety officers"}]}
